headline: Huntington Ingalls (HII) Valuation Check After New U.S. Navy Small Surface Combatant Contract Boosts Attention
summary: Huntington Ingalls Industries (HII) is back in the spotlight after the U.S. Navy tapped its Ingalls Shipbuilding division to design and build a new small surface combatant fleet, sending the stock higher. See our latest analysis for Huntington Ingalls Industries. The Navy contract arrives on top of a string of operational milestones, from progress on the Virginia class submarine Oklahoma to advances on the ROMULUS unmanned surface vessel line. Investors have noticed, with the stock delivering...
